channel.title: Xiaomi Pad 5 MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater
channel.description: Your best website to track MIUI ROM releases!

image.title: Xiaomi Pad 5 MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI V12.5.8.0.RKXMIXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi Pad 5 Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi Pad 5 Global

Codename: nabu

Version: V12.5.8.0.RKXMIXM | 11.0

Size: 3.3 GB

MD5: 9235e47a6f49b80d1ef974ed45383379

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Resource-intensive games can now work in the background
Fix: Device rebooted unexpectedly in some cases
Updated Android Security Patch to August 2021. Increased system security.
[Stylus & keyboard]
Optimization: Xiaomi Smart Pen's performance
Fix: Keyboards couldn't be connected in some cases
[Other improvements and optimizations]
Optimization: Audio quality for games
[Other]
Fix: Wi-Fi connection abnormalities

Download: Here
